sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import {Stack, Typography, Box} from '@mui/material' import SideBar from './SideBar.jsx' import Videos from "./Videos.jsx"; import {FetchFromAPI } from '../Utils/FetchFromAPI.js' const Feed = () => { const [selectedCategory, setselectedCategory] = useState('New') const [videos, setvideos] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { FetchFromAPI(`search?part=snippet&q=${selectedCategory}`) .then((data)=>setvideos(data.items)) }, [selectedCategory]) return ( copyright @2023 LAURA New videos ) } export default Feed
